title: Mason
description: Lays bricks/blocks, builds walls, plastering. Heavy lifting outdoors.

title: Carpenter
description: Cuts, shapes, assembles wooden structures, furniture, formwork.

title: Steel Fixer
description: Installs steel bars/reinforcement in concrete structures. Physically demanding.

title: Scaffolder
description: Sets up scaffolding for construction sites. Requires balance, strength.

title: Painter
description: Paints walls, ceilings, structures. Prepares surfaces and applies coatings.

title: Tile/Marble Fixer
description: Installs tiles/marble in floors and walls. Requires precision and bending.

title: Plasterer
description: Applies plaster to walls and ceilings, smooths surfaces. Heavy, repetitive work.

title: Shuttering/Formwork Carpenter
description: Builds molds for concrete casting. Heavy, standing, lifting work.

title: Welder
description: Joins metal parts using welding machines. Requires precision and safety awareness.

title: Pipe Fitter / Plumber
description: Installs and repairs water/gas pipelines, sanitary fittings. Physical bending and lifting.

title: Plumber
description: Installs and repairs water/gas pipelines, sanitary fittings. Physical bending and lifting.

title: Electrician
description: Installs, maintains, and repairs electrical systems. Risk of shocks if untrained.

title: AC / HVAC Technician
description: Installs, maintains, and repairs AC and cooling systems. Involves lifting and precision.

title: Mechanical / Electrical Technician
description: Maintains machinery, small engines, or electrical equipment. Moderate physical work.

title: Automotive Mechanic
description: Repairs cars, trucks, or heavy vehicles. Hands-on, physical, sometimes oily work.

title: Heavy/Trailer Driver
description: Operates trucks or trailers. Long hours, requires endurance and focus.

title: Light Vehicle Driver
description: Drives cars, vans, minibuses. Long hours possible, moderate physical activity.

title: Bus/Coaster Driver
description: Drives passenger vehicles on local or intercity routes. Responsible for safety and schedules.

title: Delivery Driver
description: Delivers goods/packages. Requires physical handling of parcels.

title: Forklift Operator
description: Operates forklifts in warehouses or construction. Moderate lifting, attention to safety.

title: Excavator / Backhoe Operator
description: Operates heavy earthmoving equipment. Long hours, outdoor, physically stressful.

title: Crane / Hoist Operator
description: Operates cranes or hoists on construction sites. Requires precision and safety compliance.

title: Loader / Bulldozer Operator
description: Operates loaders/bulldozers. Heavy machinery, long hours, outdoor work.

title: Machine Operator (Factory)
description: Runs factory machines, monitors production. Standing and repetitive tasks.

title: Packaging / Loading / Shipping Worker
description: Packs, labels, and moves goods. Heavy lifting and repetitive tasks.

title: Factory / Manufacturing Worker
description: Works on assembly lines or production units. Standing, repetitive, sometimes physically demanding.

title: Warehouse Worker
description: Loads, unloads, stores goods. Moderate to heavy physical effort.

title: Storekeeper
description: Maintains stock records, organizes storage. Mostly administrative with light physical work.

title: Office Assistant / Admin Assistant
description: Supports office work: filing, data entry, minor errands. Mostly seated work.

title: Clerk / Data Entry
description: Inputs data, maintains records, office support. Minimal physical effort.

title: Receptionist
description: Handles calls, visitors, schedules appointments. Mostly desk-based work.

title: Security Guard
description: Monitors premises, ensures safety. Can involve patrolling and standing long hours.

title: Salesman / Retail Staff
description: Sells products, assists customers, manages shelves. Moderate physical activity.

title: Housekeeping Attendant
description: Cleans rooms, changes linens, tidies facilities. Repetitive standing and bending.

title: Cleaner / Cleaning & Laundry Worker
description: Sweeps, mops, washes, handles laundry. Physically repetitive.

title: General Labourer (Specified)
description: Performs manual tasks: carrying, digging, loading. Heavy physical effort.

title: General Labourer (Unspecified)
description: Miscellaneous manual labor in construction or factories. Physically demanding.

title: Chef / Cook
description: Prepares meals in hotels, restaurants, or labor camps. Standing, fast-paced work.

title: Cook Helper / Kitchen Helper
description: Assists main cook: chopping, cleaning, carrying items, dishwashing. Standing work.

title: Baker / Pastry / Dessert Maker
description: Prepares bread, pastries, desserts. Mixing, shaping, oven handling.

title: Butcher
description: Cuts, prepares, and packs meat. Requires strength and hygiene awareness.

title: Barista / Coffee Maker
description: Prepares beverages, serves customers. Mostly standing and repetitive motions.

title: Waiter / Steward
description: Serves food and drinks, clears tables. Long standing hours, fast-paced.

title: Caregiver / Nursing Aide
description: Assists elderly/disabled with daily activities, hygiene, and medication. Physically and emotionally demanding.

title: Beautician / Fitness Staff
description: Provides beauty or fitness services: massage, makeup, exercise guidance. Light to moderate effort.

title: Agriculture / Farm Worker
description: Planting, watering, harvesting crops. Heavy outdoor labor.

title: Poultry Worker
description: Feeds, cleans, and maintains poultry. Moderate lifting and cleaning.

title: Gardener / Landscaping
description: Plants, trims, waters, and maintains gardens. Physical outdoor work.

title: Aviation / Cruise Staff
description: Works on ships or planes: cabin service, cleaning, guest assistance. Standing, customer-facing.

title: Construction Helper (General)
description: Assists skilled workers on sites: carrying, mixing, cleaning. Physically demanding.

title: Laundry Worker
description: Washes, folds, and irons clothes in hotels or factories. Repetitive, standing work.
